heading: Language and languages. Orthography and spelling.
general-note: Here are entered works on orthography, spelling, and spelling reform in languages in general. Works dealing with the effort to reform English orthography are entered under. Spelling reform.. Works dealing with orthography, spelling, and spelling reform in specific languages or groups of languages are entered under the name of the language with subdivision. Orthography and spelling,. e.g.. French language--Orthography and spelling..
